system.description: Effect: Select a Movement Type that you possess. Make a Skill check for that Movement Type's associated Skill, and add 1 +1 per DoS to that Movement Score for the rest of the round.

actions.name: Rush
actions.description: Effect: Select a Movement Type that you possess. Make a Skill check for that Movement Type's associated Skill, and add 1 +1 per DoS to that Movement Score for the rest of the round.
